gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.args

Interface Arguments

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Args, ArgsDecorator, ConfigFileArg, CreateConfigArg, DateRangeArg, VerboseArg

    public interface Arguments
    Decorator interface for command line arguments.
    Author:
    Tom Parker
